biotools.summary: Web-based resource for cancer-related analysis of genomic variants (single base substitutions and indels).  It provides scoring, sorting, filtering, and interactive visualizations to assist with identification of important variants.

bioschemas.name: CRAVAT
bioschemas.summary: Web-based resource for cancer-related analysis of genomic variants (single base substitutions and indels).  It provides scoring, sorting, filtering, and interactive visualizations to assist with identification of important variants.
